title: Fragment, late 18th–early 19th century
medium:
Medium: silk; tempera
Technique: printed and painted on plain weave
description: White ground divided in to circles and lozenges by slender vines and blossoms, foliage and buds. Round floral group in center of each circle. Single blossoms with four leaves in each lozenge.

tombstone.epitaph:
Fragment, late 18th–early 19th century.
late 18th–early 19th century. Medium: silk; tempera
Technique: printed and painted on plain weave. Gift of Jacob H. Schiff. 1906-21-30.
